alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued May 18 at 3:06AM MDT until May 19 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible in the Wind River Range. Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph in the Lander Foothills. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk, especially for light and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
